actions.name: Radiant Leaf
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage + 5 (2d4) radiant.

actions.name: Light Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 8 (2d4+3) radiant.

actions.name: Healing Radiance (Recharge: Short/Long Rest)
actions.desc: Radiates a warm light. Each friendly creature within 10 ft. of the sprite regains 5 (2d4) hp. It can't use this action if it hasn't been exposed to sunlight in the past 24 hrs.

special_abilities.name: Diurnal
special_abilities.desc: At night or when underground it has disadvantage on initiative rolls and Wis (Perception) checks.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Plants
special_abilities.desc: Can communicate with plants as if they shared a language.

special_abilities.name: Variable Illumination
special_abilities.desc: Sheds bright light in a 5 ft. to 20' radius and dim light for extra number of feet equal to chosen radius. It can alter radius as a bonus action. It can't use this trait if it hasn't been exposed to sunlight in past 24 hrs.
